location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: ‘[Un-numbered file] British Consulate Muscat 5803 Aviation: Kuria Muria Islands- information regarding’

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in chronological order from the front to the rear of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 3, these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: The file contains one letter sent by the Political Resident at Bushire to the Deputy Secretary to the Government of India regarding the future of the Kuria Muria Islands, Oman.
